text: Cold Blade or Yu nu qin qing is a 1970 Hong Kong action film directed by Chor Yuen. ==Cast== *Pin Chang *Kuan Tai Chen *Manling Chen *Siu Loi Chow *Kong Chu *Yao Chung *Yuan Gao *Terry Hu *Shan Kong *Man Tai Lee *Ying Lee *Jason Pai Piao *Tsai Pao Tung *Ingrid Hu Yin-Yin ==External links== * * Cold Blade at HKcinemamagic.com Category:1970 films Category:Hong Kong films Category:1970s action films Category:Mandarin-language films Category:Films directed by Chor Yuen Category:Hong Kong action films
title: Cold Blade
